description: ## Overview [electron](https://www.npmjs.com/package/electron) is a framework which lets you write cross-platform desktop applications using JavaScript, HTML and CSS. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Out-of-bounds Write allowing a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.  **Note:** The Stable channel has been updated to 120.0.6099.234 for Mac devices. ## Remediation Upgrade `electron` to version 26.6.6, 27.2.3, 28.1.4 or higher. ## References - [Chrome Releases](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2024/01/stable-channel-update-for-desktop_16.html) - [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/electron/electron/commit/b3ca1a1f96bae5352f420ef1f77cc9d7fd5957c6) - [GitHub PR](https://github.com/electron/electron/pull/41013#issuecomment-1894846720) - [GitHub PR](https://github.com/electron/electron/pull/41015)
remediation: Upgrade electron to version 26.6.6, 27.2.3, 28.1.4 or higher.
title: Out-of-bounds Write

vulnDescription.Overview: electron is a framework which lets you write cross-platform desktop applications using JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
